Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in react-datepicker-plus.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.4.2 up to 2.4.3
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.4.2, all versions after 2.4.3
